headline: Trump’s Gift to Iran’s Hard-Liners
abstract: The president put us on a path toward conflict and turmoil with Iran.
lead_paragraph: President Trump says that on his watch, Iran will never be allowed to have a nuclear weapon. But if he had wanted to keep that promise, he should have left the 2015 Iran nuclear agreement in place. Instead, he pulled the United States out of the deal and pursued a reckless foreign policy that has put us on a path to armed conflict with Iran.
